p.k: The sexy Avery Black walks into her room and is shocked to see her boyfriend, Oliver Davis, jerking off to something on his phone. Avery teases Oliver and looks at his phone, only to find that he's jerking off to an image of her! Avery finds this adorable and reminds Oliver that he can just jerk off to the real thing. She does a striptease and some sexy posing for Oliver, before making things interactive by sucking and fucking the lucky guy. We'd like to see a phone do that!
